channel.title: burton on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in burton on Barefoot Rob

item.title: sold myself on Burton bag (almost)
item.description: 16:33 Wednesday 22 June 2016 JST So just after writing the previous entry, I thought I can gain fake internet points by writing (and updating) a mega-detailed(?) review of the Burton bag which caught my eye today. I don’t have pictures of the bag, but I do have questions, or one burning question and a little question which I will compose here and then email to burton customer service.
